Name: Polymatic
About the game: Did you ever dreamed solving unknown problems while having fun? Did you struggle trying to find your way amidst the endless meaningful distractions that life requires? So we present you: POLYMATIC is a new machine to best all devices! POLYMATIC is a minimal and streamlined interface that handles all kind of complex and mysterious stuff behind the stage just for you. Face no morality choices, no resource management, no career plans, no crater boxes, no dilemma at all! The answer is always before your very eyes! Match incoming waves with ours exclusive OPTIMAL GEOMETRIC CENTRAL SOLVER , and endure all fun in the process! POLYMATIC only requirement is your (hopefully) already sharp eye-to-fingers coordination. Relax your mind, awake your reflexes and become a true Polymaster! FEATURING: . Clear crisp minimalist and colorful graphics ; . Unobtrusive menus, jump fast into action ; . Highly replayable skill-based gameplay ; . Very simple controls (only three keyboard keys) ; . Endless score-based gameplay challenge!
